name: Color my dreams
description:
Sunrises and sunsets are two of my favorite things in the world. Observing a sunset or sunrise is similar to meditating for me. So no matter where I go, I don't want to miss seeing a sunset. I do this a lot to recharge my batteries, seeking solitude and the richness of self. Yeah, I'm sitting here watching a sunset.

Yes, when I watch a sunset, I rediscover myself, and it inspires me to stay cheerful and spread positive energy.
